entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning then changing to a few rain showers near noon and ending this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High plus 5 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
